subject: Dear Beloved  in Christ
body:
Dear Beloved  in Christ 
I appreciate your contact details sent to me for assisting me for
claimming my late husband funds in the bank, And thanks for your
concern about my health it proves that you can handle this funds for
me and protect me in building and Ophanage home in your country for
the less priviledge and for other investment project.
I have every prove of fund document with me should incase the BANK may
request from you, I am here to provide any document requested from the
bank.
Kindly contact the bank where the money was Deposit to prove that I
Mrs Maria Timrott instructed you for the claim of my late husband
inheritance fund.
I have put every logistics in place to enable us have smooth
conclusion without any problem, Please advice should in case of any
message you received from the bank i might be busy at the hospital for
my treatment or i will be in operation room any moment from next week
Looking forward to your immediate response.
Regards,
Mrs Maria Timrott
::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
SEND THE BELOW MESSAGE TO THE BANK EMAIL ADDRESS
                                                     UBA BANK PLC.
                                            FEDERAL REPUBLIC OF BENIN
                                         OUR REF: U.B.A./BJ/B01/Vol 2024
                                         Email (
info.ubabj@accountant.com
)
                    ATTENTION DIRECTOR GENERAL MR GBENGA MAKINDE
My name is Mr Drone S Petersen, I am contacting your bank ON-Behalf of
Mrs Maria Timrott for the release and transfer of $4.5M (Four Million
Five Hundred Thousand United States Dollars only) from UBA dormant
vault A/C N0: 14-255-34108/UBA/BJ.
Please be informed that I wish to come for the claim, release and
transfer of the sum of ($4,500.000.00 USD) from account number
14-255-34108/UBA/BJ with your bank Having been informed of this by the
deceased wife Mrs Maria Timrott, that the above amount / money was
deposited in your bank by my Bussiness Partner Mr Kurt TIMROTT
I wish as the heir apparent with all documents of proof to claim and
instruct that the above-mentioned amount be released to me by bank
Transfer or cheque through any of your correspondence financial
institution either in Europe or Americas. I also humbly request for
the services of an accredited resident bank attorney who is empowered
by the Economic Community of West Africa States (ECO-WAS) to represent
me for the authentication/updating of my documents that will be
required to ensure speedy transfer of this fund to my bank account as
I can not be physically present there due to my official engagements
here.
Please accept this late application, I hope you will understand and
expedite action.
Thanks for your anticipated co-operation.
My Full Name : ..................... ………..
My Home Address : ....................
My Country: .................
My Age and Occupation………………
My Telephone Number : ............
My Passport Copy or Id Card: ..................... ………..

subject: Re:   Dear Beloved  in Christ
body:
Dear Mrs Maria Timrott,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing me with the opportunity to assist you in claiming your late husband's funds. I appreciate your trust in me and your desire to use the funds for a noble cause such as building an orphanage home.

I understand that you have all the necessary proof of fund documents, which is great. Could you please provide me with more details about the bank where the money was deposited? I would like to know their contact information so that I can get in touch with them and initiate the process.

Also, could you clarify what specific documents the bank might request from me? It would be helpful to have a clear understanding of what is required before proceeding further.

Regarding your health, I hope you are doing well despite being at the hospital. Please take care of yourself and prioritize your recovery. If there is anything I can do to support you during this time, please let me know.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Deborah
